attributes.action: introduce Hindi as a subject on the national curriculum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hindi is the official national language of India and there is a large population of Indians in this country who are very significant contributors to the economy of UK. Including Hindi in the national curriculum will enable an understanding of the Indian culture and help integration. India is already an important player in UK's economy and is an emerging economic superpower in the world. Many major companies have transferred their admin/call centres to India. Knowledge of Hindi will help young businesses and further improve tourism. It will also widen the choice of languages available as an additional language to UK students.
